description.value:
A device to detect poisons and display recommended counter-agents and immnisers, Can make a +0 Perception Test or +20 Medicae Test to use on a perons to determine whether they are poisoned and the best response to it, if 2+ Degrees of Success, also grants enough information to identify any existing antidote.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 100 T
